comments: (Capt. Warner: I'm Captain Bernhard Warner.  The Clue Crew joins me onboard Golden Princess--next on Jeopardy!)

clues.clue: (Cheryl of the Clue Crew reports from aboard the Golden Princess.)  I'm on this deck, whose name is from French for "walk" or "stroll"
